testcase.name: Stopped for too long alarm should trigger alarm when car stops for too long
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't trigger alarm when car stopped for less than 15 minutes
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't trigger alarm when there is too little data
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't trigger alarm when car didn't stop at all
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't check for stops beyond double the duration in the past
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't trigger alarm when there is no data in the 15 minutes (stop more than = 15 minutes)
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't trigger alarm when car stopped for more 15 minutes but 2 hours ago
Stopped for too long alarm shouldn't trigger alarm when there is too little data
